channel.title: Project luigi3
channel.description:
projecy luigi3 is maked to mka e my friends server ''new lugi2-scape'' better
it have on the moment: -working specs (whip is removed.). -fletching make a shop for it -cooking -herblore - fish -smithing -crafting and crafting shops / gems and chizzel New projectiles. added full pc aswell.(needs 377 client). working global objects varrock based dds double spec. just add some stuff and fix my bugs and make it be cool like i did
i am to lazy for making pictures....
what we need to update: castle wars... more sckills to train and summon skill and trimming skill a update that u can duel on every place a pk box and a client and web client
i need only a few peaple
coding server - - - - coding client - - - coding webclient: - - others - - - - hosting server(you must portforward if you have router and you make the no-ip) - -
